DataElement.preferredName: MBSRQ Appearance Orientation Always Trying To Improve Physical Appearance Agreement Score Likert Scale Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of their agreement to a statement about always trying to improve their physical appearance, using a five point Likert scale value captured as a non-enumerated text field.

Property.preferredName: Always Trying to Improve Physical Appearance Agreement Score
Property.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation about always trying to improve their physical appearance.:1. The act of agreeing. 2. Harmony of opinion; accord. (from American Heritage Dictionary):A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.longName: Always Trying to Improve Physical Appearance
Concepts.definition: A question about whether an individual is or was always trying to improve their physical appearance.
The act of agreeing to a plan, protocol, or arrangement. Also used to describe a harmony of opinion.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
